headline: The impact Trump tariffs could have on AI chip trade with China
summary: President-elect Donald Trump's proposed wide-sweeping tariffs could impact a wide variety of consumer goods and industries, including major US automakers who manufacture vehicles in Mexico. But how will Trump's potential tariff policies hit the semiconductor landscape? Yahoo Finance host Madison Mills lays out how new Trump tariffs could impact the AI chip and semiconductor materials trade with China. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here. This post was written by Luke Carberry Mogan.

headline: Broadcom, M&T Bank, Coherent: The latest analyst calls
summary: HSBC analysts initiated coverage of chipmaker Broadcom (AVGO) with a Hold rating and a price target of $160 per share. M&T Bank (MTB) was downgraded to Neutral from Overweight by JPMorgan, citing no general catalysts for outperformance. Coherent Corp. (COHR) was given a Buy rating and $135 price target by Jefferies analysts, who initiated coverage with optimism around new CEO Jim Anderson's restructuring plans. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here. This post was written by Luke Carberry Mogan.
